properties.Name: /cost:consolidation-plan
properties.Description: Establish strategic software consolidation roadmap with Microsoft ecosystem migration paths to drive measurable cost reduction and operational simplification

properties.Name: /cost-by-category
properties.Description: Analyze software spending by category to identify concentration patterns, optimization opportunities, and strategic investment areas that drive measurable outcomes.

properties.Name: /cost-impact
properties.Description: Instantly calculate the budget impact of proposed software additions, cancellations, or license changes to support rapid decision-making and maintain cost transparency.

properties.Name: /expiring-contracts
properties.Description: Monitor upcoming contract expirations to enable proactive renewal decisions, prevent service disruptions, and identify renegotiation opportunities that drive cost optimization.

properties.Name: /cost:identify-waste
properties.Description: Establish comprehensive software waste identification across portfolio to surface underutilized subscriptions and drive immediate cost reduction opportunities

properties.Name: /microsoft-alternatives
properties.Description: Research Microsoft ecosystem alternatives for third-party tools to drive cost optimization, improve integration, and align with Microsoft-first strategy through comprehensive service comparison and migration feasibility assessment.

properties.Name: /monthly-spend
properties.Description: Analyze total monthly software spending across all active subscriptions to establish transparent cost visibility and drive informed budget decisions.

properties.Name: /research-costs
properties.Description: Calculate comprehensive software costs for active research threads by aggregating all linked tools and services to provide transparent research budget visibility and support informed feasibility decisions.

properties.Name: /cost:track-usage
properties.Description: Establish software license utilization monitoring to identify underutilized subscriptions and drive cost optimization through data-driven rightsizing decisions

properties.Name: /unused-software
properties.Description: Detect software subscriptions with no active project links to identify potential cost savings while verifying critical infrastructure dependencies before recommending cancellations.
